main event: A civilian weather observer reported seeing an unidentified object resembling a large flare or rocket moving from east to west for 2 to 3 minutes over St. Croix Island.
interesting points: The sighting occurred on 23 February 1962., The object was observed for 2 to 3 minutes., The weather observer described the object moving from east to west., Reports concluded that there was insufficient data for proper evaluation., Various hypotheses were considered including balloon, aircraft, or astronomical phenomena.
